subject: A-1 Courier Service Ltd
body:
A-1 Courier Service Ltd
Mulia Business Park,
Building F, MT Haryono Jakarta Indonesia
Tel:+62 857 56 35 9245
ORDER NO.562725
Dear Esteem Customer,
Sequel to your email we received, Payment should be made with the below bank account details for the option you have chosen, to our account officer whose details are stated below.
account details
Bank name: BCA
Acct.name: R. R. L.
Acct. No: 229013XXXX
Swift code: CENAIDJA
Bank Address : Jl. Daan Mogot, West Jakarta , Indonesia
Beneficially Address : West Jakarta, Indonesia
NOTE: Immediately our account officer confirms your payment receipt, the delivery of your winning parcel will commence.
Do endeavor to immediately make the payment. And send a copy of the transfer or deposit slip via email for confirmation.
Awaiting your payment details.
---
We are glad to be of service to you.
Mr. Eas Banyu
Customer Service
Telephone/Whats app + 62 8 570 623 3942
A-1 Courier service
Can be contacted 24 hours a day and 365 days a year.

subject: Re:   A-1 Courier Service Ltd
body:
Hello,

Thank you for reaching out to me. I appreciate your prompt response. I have a few questions regarding the payment process. Could you please provide me with more information about the different payment options available? Additionally, are there any specific instructions or reference numbers that I need to include when making the payment?

I want to ensure that I follow the correct procedure and provide all the necessary details. Thank you for your assistance.

Best wishes,
Kristin
